Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.tamino

Contains classes and interfaces that form the base implementation of Tamino database support.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeTaminoDataSource An interface that defines the set of methods needed to give access to the Tamino database.
IAeTaminoLocalTxConnection An interface defining methods required to impl a local tx (commit-able) Tamino connection.
 

Class Summary
AeLocalTxTaminoConnection A delegate version of a tamino connection.
AePooledTaminoDataSource A pooled version of the Tamino data source.
AeTaminoConfig This class encapsulates the Tamino XQuery statements used by the Active BPEL Tamino based persistence layer.
AeTaminoDataSource The Tamino data source.
AeTaminoStorageImpl A Tamino implementation of the storage impl interface.
AeTaminoStorageProviderFactory A storage factory that creates Tamino versions of the store objects.
AeTaminoUtil A class with some static methods to do some standard Tamino related operations.
AeTaminoXMLDBConnection Tamino implementation of an XMLDB connection.
AeTaminoXQueryResponse A Tamino implementation of an XQuery response.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.tamino Description

Contains classes and interfaces that form the base implementation of Tamino database support. This includes base classes for storage objects, the Tamino data source, response handlers, connection classes, etc...
